definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: The Kizil Grottoes were built one century early than the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 克孜尔石窟营造年代早于敦煌莫高窟一个多世纪。

sentences.english: Fourth, solving the energy supply problem in rural areas through the establishment of fuel woods.
sentences.chinese: 四是通过营造薪炭林，解决农村能源问题。

sentences.english: You’re building a 12)rat ship here, a vessel for sea-going snitches.
sentences.chinese: 你们在营造一艘耗子船，一艘告密者的大船。

sentences.english: Rather, it conjures up a quiet and dutiful domesticity.
sentences.chinese: 但这幅画营造出一种安静祥和且各司其职的家庭生活。

sentences.english: New Mother Town is expected to help ABP create a homelike atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 新母城为总部基地营造家一般的发展氛围。

sentences.english: Want to use auxiliary illuminant to build atmosphere additionally.
sentences.chinese: 另外要利用辅助光源营造气氛。

sentences.english: Who is using the hard-working hands, as we have built a happy home?
sentences.chinese: 是谁用勤劳的双手，为我们营造一个温馨的家园？

sentences.english: " The whole space exerts all efforts on building the "self-pleasing" living atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 整个空间全力营造“赏心悦己”的居住氛围。
我营造了这份低摩擦的工作。

sentences.english: Contractors have started building on waste land near the town.
sentences.chinese: 承包商在城附近的荒地上开始从事营造业。

sentences.english: Powerful brand city, to spare no effort to create a good atmosphere of brand and market.
sentences.chinese: 实施品牌强市，要全力营造争创品牌市场的良好氛围。

sentences.english: You're building a rat ship here. A vessel for sea going snitches.
sentences.chinese: 你正在这里营造一艘小人船，一艘告密者的大船。

sentences.english: Internal walls are lined with wood panelling that forms a warm, neutral backdrop to the space.
sentences.chinese: 建筑内墙采用木质镶嵌版营造出一个温暖中立的空间。

sentences.english: The builder refused genially, as he did everything else.
sentences.chinese: 营造者的拒绝是很婉转的，这人无往而不婉转。

sentences.english: We enjoy talking about how to build our future!
sentences.chinese: 我们喜欢谈论如何营造我们的未来。

sentences.english: Use a mix of contrasting colors to create a dynamic feel.
sentences.chinese: 运用混合的对比色可以营造一种很有活力的感觉。

definition: background (of a painting)/backdrop/a foil (to set off something to advantage)/to offset (something to advantage)
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
to establish/to found/to create (a good environment)
